questions.text: Which of the following statements accurately describes battered baby syndrome?

options.label: A
options.text: Skin lesions and bruises of various ages are seen on the body

options.label: B
options.text: It occurs due to the tendency of a child to fall repeatedly

options.label: D
options.text: The syndrome is a result of firearm injuries

questions.correct_answer: A. Skin lesions and bruises of various ages are seen on the body
